page.title: 24Puckpool Park in 2011
page.content:
Puckpool Park is still a very popular leisure park with people of all ages, and apart from some updating of its facilities it is much the same as it was in 1986.

It still has a children's play area, a cafeteria, tennis courts, and a crazy golf course. The swings and slides etc in the children's play area have been recently updated, as has the crazy golf course.

However, the pitch and putt course has gone, the bowling green has gone, and very sadly both the aquarium and the aviary are gone; these are all much missed by those of us who remember them.

Entrance is still free, and surprisingly car parking is also free - at the moment - but the ticket machines are still there.
